name: screenshot-mcp
description: MCP server that provides screenshot functionality using winshot.sh

scripts.build-universal: bun build src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-darwin-arm64 --outfile=dist/screenshot-mcp-arm64 && bun build src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-darwin-x64 --outfile=dist/screenshot-mcp-x64 && lipo -create dist/screenshot-mcp-arm64 dist/screenshot-mcp-x64 -output dist/screenshot-mcp-universal
scripts.qa: bun run check && bun run typecheck && bun run test
